text.calc: 00000001#HTTP OW3 Worker00000000#The HTTP OW3 Worker Object can run either on the main thead or asynchronously on a background thread giving the user continued use of the application whilst waiting for a response.Various HTTP methods are provided which may also be used to create your own restful web services client. The worker object also supports https, http headers and basic and digest authentication.In this example press Start to run the selected http method on the background thread or Run to use the current thread.
